CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ovid Therapeutics Inc is a biopharmaceutical company. The firm is primarily engaged in developing impactful medicines for patients and families living who are suffering from epilepsies, seizure-related disorders, and neurological disorders. It is targeting disorders such as intellectual disability, severe speech impairment, problems with movement and balance, sleep disorders and anxiety to transform the patient's life.
